casebody.data:
WORLEY, et al.
v.
MOORE, et al. 310A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Adam H. Charnes, Attorney at Law, Thomas J. Ludlam, Attorney at Law, John M. Moye, Attorney at Law, for Moore, Roy J., et al. R. Daniel Boyce, Attorney at Law, David S. Pokela, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Jerrold Joseph Ganzfried, Attorney at Law, for Worley, Dennis, et al The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2017 by Plaintiffs for Leave to Submit Supplemental Response: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017." Ervin, J. recused
